name: Dicefighters
description:
A digital board game for 2-6 players locally.

TLDR version: This is basically an arena fighter but as a board game.

Take control of 20 different characters and brawl it out in the arena using dice. Each turn the players roll the dice to gain different attacks and movement options. Then they need to execute all of them. By taking down opponents you will score and the first to score 3 points is the winner.

Complete the story mode to learn more about the characters in the game and unlock them for play as you go.

Can't find anyone to play with? Don't worry, there are AI opponents to add so you can always play a round if you feel like it.

Features:

  • Story mode: Learn to play the game as you unlock new characters to play with.
  • AI opponents of 3 different difficulties.
  • 20 different characters with unique abilities to play as.
  • Multiple map sizes and configurations.
  • 4 different game modes: Normal scoring , team, survival and damage games.

Controls:

Use the mouse. The right mouse button also has some functionality in some menus.

Developed with Game Maker 8
